data.title: Archive of Our Own
data.meta_description:
An Archive of Our Own, a project of the
    Organization for Transformative Works
data.text:
Beomgyu certainly didn't expect to die on that day and he most certainly did not except to wake up as a fledgling vampire in a coven full of unfairly hot men. Cause if he did he would have chosen a much nicer outfit. You would think the whole being a vampire would be the most shocking part but it was far from it.Follow Beomgyu on his journey to becoming a vampire worthy of his Coven. Little does he know they are already whipped for him.

This is an ot5 fic although some members have closer bonds but they still all love each other not Beomgyu centric. Changing POV

You meet Suguru Geto at your work, he is charming, gorgeous, and has a poly lifestyle. You jump in, and you all share women and have way too much fun. But then it's starting to get serious between you, official even. He can't wait to have you meet his best friend.

But... Satoru Gojo hates you. The minute you meet. He gives you no reason, but he's nasty to you, no matter what you try. Suguru finally has enough of Satoru being so mean and brings up the idea - 'let's have you two fuck this frustration out'

Satoru deep down wants to make you his. He doesn't even understand how Suguru could ever want anyone but you, nor how he could want his best friend's girl. So he's mean... and he just totally hates you. Right?

Though it's a horrible idea, he agrees to share you with Suguru for a chance to touch you and... The moment he touches you...

Rules are bent and broken, Suguru develops feelings for another girl, and Satoru gets further obsessed with you, while you're left confused... will everyone get hurt by this?

ANGSTY Yandere Gojo.

It's a hot summer's day in the Ashmont area, and Alexio Cort√©s is just a dude who hangs out at their three best friends' (Taylor Hayes, Kathren Curtis, and Jessica Patterson) apartment when they aren't working at the local Market Basket or their mother's flower shop. But when Kathren tells them that Taylor and her have been sleeping together on and off behind their back for six months, Alexio finds themself lost, unable to reason out why Taylor would ask Kathren to help him keep their affair secret for so long. Running into Kathren a week after the reveal, Alexio decides they are ready to get the full story, confront Taylor, and hopefully fix whatever they seem to have broken.

When an accident kills All Might a month before the UA entrance exam, Yume Midoriya must find her way through her grief while discovering the legacy of the power she's been given. Alongside new comrades, friends, and loved ones, she will strive to become the hero that she's always wanted to be. Society is shaken, hope is waning, and the darkness hidden within the shadows of hero society begins to creep back up to the surface. And the heroes must work tirelessly to battle against it.

(Feat. transfem Izuku & other gay characters!)

Vol. 1: Origins (Ch 1-5)

Vol. 2: Beginnings at UA (Ch 6-11)

Vol. 3: The USJ Incident (Ch 12-15)

Vol. 4: Finding Support (Ch 16 -18)

Vol. 5: Sports Festival (Ch 19-25)

Vol. 6: After the Festival (Ch 26 - 27)

Vol. 7: Internships (Ch 28 - N/A)

Three deeply flawed and broken people go on a journey to fix their past mistakes, meet old friends, and navigate the sticky bonds of love and lust together.

After defeating the Netherbrain, Tav and Astarion are living in the underdark with the spawn they freed. It‚Äôs difficult, but they are newly in love and happy together. Tav searches for a way for him to walk in the sun again while they strengthen and explore their new relationship.

But Tav is haunted by the death of Gortash, her former partner. She learned they share a child she did not remember bearing, a child now lost and in danger.

Now Tav has grown desperate to bring back her ex-lover, to learn more about her past and find their baby. She cannot tell Astarion any of it out of guilt for the other reason she wants Gortash back‚Äî she misses him and still wants him.

Tav is filled with guilt but intends to go forward anyway; she always gets her way when she puts her mind to something. But first she has to tell Astarion the truth.

Can their bond survive?
